link.script: {"url":"https://www.mlkcs.org","name":"Martin Luther King, Jr. Charter School of Excellence","description":"","image":"//static1.squarespace.com/static/5b6c420c36099b4bf6596ac3/t/5cf540e56720250001c19a71/1587148219964/","@context":"http://schema.org","@type":"WebSite"}

img.alt: Martin Luther King, Jr. Charter School of Excellence
Martin Luther King, Jr. Charter School of Excellence

div.class: image-block-outer-wrapper layout-caption-below design-layout-inline combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none

p.strong:
“INTELLIGENCE PLUS CHARACTER -
THAT IS THE GOAL OF TRUE EDUCATION.”
-DR. MARTIN LUTHER KING, JR.

div.p: Martin Luther King, Jr. Charter School of Excellence prepares kindergarten through fifth grade students of Springfield for academic success and engaged citizenship through insistence on rigorous, challenging work. The school incorporates Dr. King’s commitment to the highest standards in scholarship, civic participation, and the ideal of the beloved community.
